query: Select MAX(alloy) AS kind,MAX(case when left(data,1)='[' THEN 'BEEF' ELSE data END) AS xc,(CASE WHEN left(data,1)='[' THEN (CASE WHEN MAX(alloy) = 'Metal' THEN 0.094 WHEN MAX(alloy) = 'III' THEN 0.111 WHEN MAX(alloy) = 'IV' THEN 0.13 WHEN MAX(alloy) = 'V' THEN 0.14 WHEN MAX(alloy) = 'VI' THEN 0.09 WHEN MAX(alloy) = 'VII' THEN 0.07 ELSE 0.04 END) ELSE POW(AVG(POW(ce-expt_ce,2)),0.5) END) AS rmse from bulks join job on job=job_id join calc on calc=calc_id join functional on functional=functional_id where expt_ce-ce is not null GROUP BY data,alloy
title: RMSE Cohesive energy errors
